messages.subject: handwriting/printing with printer
messages.msgSnippet: I m really looking forward to getting a laser printer that has better registration so I can do this type of thing. Our 12+ year old dot matrix printer starts
messages.messageBody:
I'm really looking forward to getting a laser printer that has better
registration so I can do this type of thing. Our 12+ year old dot matrix
printer starts about 1/2 inch down, and not fully predictably, either.

Since I'm a graphic designer, this drives me batty!

:-) Diane

> I buy labels when they are on sale and use them! You can get a free
> 'wizard' from Avery (it works on top of Word) to format it correctly!
> I do my own return address labels, my mommy "business" cards and labels
> for the bins we use to try to keep things organized.
